Hi,
	Anybody know of any work modelling an ANN as a system of PDEs?

	e.g. dA/dt = k(weighted_sum(inputs) - A)

	(A = activation before sigmoid)

	That throws away the nice, integer time-steps aspect to the system.  But 
it also irons out any questions where different implementations do things 
in different orders and it allows delays of parts of time-steps and even 
delays where the result of an input at a single time is spread smoothly 
across a time period....

	Ian B (being theoretical)
